entry.title: PLEATED 2-IN-1 BODYSUIT(GREY CHECK)
entry.summary:
Vendor: BLARA
Type: BABY(0-24MTHS)
Price: 79.00

Crafted from organic linen and cotton blend, this bodysuit for baby boys is an ideal item for an outdoor event. The short-sleeved silhouette has decorative tucks next to the placket, and the placket goes all the way down to the shorts' bottom with buttons. Elastic trim at both sides of the waist.

  • Style# BLRBD210103724
  • Fabric: Linen (50% organic linen, 50% organic cotton)
    Sueded Oxford (100% organic cotton)
  • Designed in Canada
  • Made in China
Organic Cotton
  • Our products are made with you, your family and our planet in mind! The cotton used in our collections is certified organic by GOTS, which guarantees that our fabrics must be produced without the use of pesticides, synthetic fertilizers, and genetically engineered seeds.
Natural Dye
  • Using plants, fruits, and traditional Chinese medicinal products we are able to dye our fabrics without adding any harmful chemicals. This innovative technology is good for you, your loved ones and our planet!
